name: Exotic Avians
description:
This is EXOTIC AVIANS! Exotic Avians is a game where you CUSTOMIZE your own bird's tint, then run and fly in a world with swamps, plains, and savannas! If you can't find those places, try exploring a bit more. Who knows? If you're a flying bird (cardinal, seagull, flamingo), you can fly off to OTHER LANDS! In the future, you will be able to help birds that are in danger!

Controls:

WASD to move

Changelog:

beta 1: game in beta
